text: Focus Fire || A good archer is known not by his arrows but by his ability to hit the target.
Second Wind || "We must hold the line... just a little while longer."
Warp Spasm || Let the blood rage take control.
Stand and Fight || A fierce warrior never worries about his fear."\\n\\n [[col:red]]Units cannot move whilst in this formation.[[/col]]
Flaming Arrows || Like a maniac shooting flaming arrows of death...
Rally || The presence of the general gives encouragement to the men who die for him.
Rapid Advice || "On my commandâ€¦ Forwarrrrrrd!"
Sea King's Banner || "Flock to our standard, brave lads!"
Hold Firm || "Dig your heels in!"
Highland Charge || "No tactics or maneuvres... just straight at 'em!"
Resolve || "Any man found retreating will be summarily executed."
Sea King's Banner || "Show them the true power of the Norse!"
Marksmenship || "Our arrows will blot out the sun!"
Inspire || War requires resilience of spirit and the strength of character to see things through to the end.
Hero's Banner || "Men of Wales take heart, the Sons of Arthur ride with you!"
Warcry || "You don't frighten us, pig-dogs. We'll split you in two and use your gizzards for a football!"
Devoted Crew || These men would follow their captain anywhere, and fight almost anyone on his behalf. [[col:green]]Active until the Champion falls.[[/col]]
Mounted Infantry || Trained to fight on foot, these men must dismount to be effective. \\n\\n[[col:red]]Debuff active while Mounted.[[/col]]
Schiltron || "Together lads, we'll stop them on all sides!"\\n\\n[[col:red]]Units cannot move in this formation.[[/col]]
Battle Trance || Mad as dogs, strong as bears, the Berserker kill without hesitation until the last enemy falls. \\n\\n[[col:green]]Active until the Champion falls.[[/col]]
Wedge Formation || Even the strongest line infantry cannot stand up to a reinforced point.
Bonesplitting Strikes || Heavy strikes cleave through bone and flesh.
Parry || Bladesmenship is a rewarding form of art.
